channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- BIOVIA Materials Studio products
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dassault Systèmes -- BIOVIA Materials Studio products

item.title: CVE-2023-6078|2024-02-01T13:33:48.731Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- biovia%20materials%20studio%20products
item.description: An OS Command Injection vulnerability exists in BIOVIA Materials Studio products from Release BIOVIA 2021 through Release BIOVIA 2023. Upload of a specially crafted perl script can lead to arbitrary command execution.
